sec.title: September 13-16, 2012
sec.p: “Women: Evolving Roles in Society and Family,” American Association for Marriage and Family Therapy, 70th Annual Conference, Charlotte, North Carolina. Deadline for online submission of abstracts: December 21, 2011. Contact: American Association for Marriage and Family Therapy (112 South Alfred Street, Alexandria, VA 22314-3061; telephone: 703-838-9808; Fax: 703-838-9805; email: ccentral@aamft.org; web site: www.aamft.org).

sec.title: October 4-6, 2012
sec.p: “The Future of Integrated Health Care: Activating Clinicians, Consumers, Researchers, and Policy Makers,” Collaborative Family Healthcare Association, 14th Annual Conference, Hyatt Regency Austin, Austin, Texas. Call for presentations will open February 1, 2012. Contact: Collaborative Family Healthcare Association (P.O. Box 23980, Rochester, NY 14692-3980; email: info@CFHA.net; web site: http://www.cfha.net).

sec.title: October 31-November 3, 2012
sec.p: “Families and Health,” National Council on Family Relations, 74th Annual Conference, Hyatt Hotel, Phoenix, Arizona. Online submission of abstracts due March 1, 2012 (http://www.ncfr.org/ncfr-2012). Contact: National Council on Family Relations (1201 West River Parkway, Suite 200, Minneapolis, MN 55454; telephone: 888-781-9331; fax: 763-781-9348; web site: http://www.ncfr.org/).

sec.title: June 19-22, 2013
sec.p: “Honoring the Past, Celebrating the Future,” 11th International Family Nursing Conference, Hyatt Regency Minneapolis, Minnesota. This conference will be the official meeting of the International Family Nursing Association. Call for papers will open in October 2012. Contact: International Family Nursing Association (461 Cochran Road, Box No. 246 Pittsburgh, PA (telephone: 412-344-1414; fax: 412-344-0599; email: debbie@internationalfamilynursing.org; web site: http://www.internationalfamilynursing.org).

sec.title: October 10-12, 2013
sec.p: Collaborative Family Healthcare Association, 15th Annual Conference, Omni Interlocken Resort, Denver, Colorado. Contact: Collaborative Family Healthcare Association (P.O. Box 23980, Rochester, NY 14692-3980; email: info@CFHA.net; web site: http://www.cfha.net).

sec.title: November 5-9, 2013
sec.p: National Council on Family Relations, 75th Annual Conference, Grand Hyatt San Antonio, Texas. Contact: National Council on Family Relations (1201 West River Parkway, Suite 200, Minneapolis, MN 55454; telephone: 888-781-9331; email: ncfr@aol.com; web site: http://www.ncfr.org/).

sec.title: November 18-22, 2014
sec.p: National Council on Family Relations, 76th Annual Conference, Hilton Baltimore, Baltimore, Maryland. Contact: National Council on Family Relations (1201 West River Parkway, Suite 200, Minneapolis, MN 55454; telephone: 888-781-9331; email: ncfr@aol.com; web site: http://www.ncfr.org/).
